name: Alice Johnson
text: Alice is a software engineer with 3 years of experience in web development using React and Node.js. She built an e-commerce website project.

name: Bob Smith
text: Bob is a data scientist skilled in Python, machine learning, and data visualization. He worked on predicting customer churn.

name: Charlie Lee
text: Charlie is a backend developer experienced in Java, Spring Boot, and databases. He designed scalable APIs for banking systems.
